name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.qjournal.http.open.timeout.ms
description:
Timeout in milliseconds when open a new HTTP connection to remote
    journals.

name: dfs.mover.movedWinWidth
description:
The minimum time interval, in milliseconds, that a block can be
    moved to another location again.

name: ipc.client.connection.maxidletime
description:
The maximum time in msec after which a client will bring down the
               connection to the server.

name: ipc.server.listen.queue.size
description:
Indicates the length of the listen queue for servers accepting
               client connections.

name: hadoop.security.group.mapping.ldap.connection.timeout.ms
description:
This property is the connection timeout (in milliseconds) for LDAP
    operations. If the LDAP provider doesn't establish a connection within the
    specified period, it will abort the connect attempt. Non-positive value
    means no LDAP connection timeout is specified in which case it waits for the
    connection to establish until the underlying network times out.

name: dfs.block.access.token.lifetime
description: The lifetime of access tokens in minutes.
